item.title: My blog setup with Hugo and Org Mode
item.author: Nethum Lamahewage
item.description: Introduction I started this site on the 15th of April 2022. However, I wrote my first article on the 11th of May 2021, on Medium. I’ve republished it and the second one here, because I want this to be the original source for all my articles. Going forward, this is going to be the home for all my articles, so I wanted to write one about how this site came to be.
